name: Insane Gatlings
description:
Game is still in early development but this game has polished shooting and slow motion. No Unity physics. Custom physics to allow great slow motion.

To start flying with a keyboard, press "up arrow" key to gain speed with the blades. When there is blue air showing, hold "e" and mouse move up to make the helicopter lift. "e" is no longer needed unless a player wants to make a faster lift/drop with the helicopter.

Input devices supported:

Keyboard & Mouse

Logitech controller

XBox controller
